alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 12:26PM EST until March 12 at 11:30PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam affecting Pulaski and Ballard Counties. Ohio River at Cairo affecting Pulaski, Carlisle, Fulton, Ballard, Hickman, Alexander and Mississippi Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Paducah affecting McCracken, Pope, Livingston and Massac Counties. For the Ohio River...including Paducah, Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 42.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 43.0 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
